title: Can you print white ink? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, we can print in the DTG printer used for direct print on cotton dark color t-shirts. There are 5 inkjet CYMK and White Basically, first of all, white color is applied on all content to be printed thereafter applied all color on it. mostly used for digital printing on dark base color stuff to make color prominent. For the same purpose used in UV printing, flatbed printer know more click here Shivani Enterprises

If having access to a ‘color’ printer and a ‘white’ ink cartridge: it might be doable on a color of paper that’s not the exact same shade of white. A stationary professional printing store could probably do a printing project—for a fee—with white ink, if given enough preparation time. (White text is difficult to read unless it’s applied to a darker (surface) page.)
